title: Store won't load
body:
Help,

For the past few weeks when I click the store button it just goes to a black screen. I've tried everything to fix it;
Reset IE
Update IE
Add all the TLS SSL stuff
Allow scripts
Patch the client
repair the client
Allow cookies
Lower the firewall 

But nothing seems to work.
Has anyone else had this problem or know how to fix it?

I don't want to do a reinstall because I'm currently using my phone as a hotspot and excess data charges are brutal.
